    blouch.adapt.prep - Setup dat file to run adaptive model

    blouch.adapt.prep.Rd

    blouch.adapt.prep - Setup dat file to run adaptive model

    blouch.adapt.prep(
  trdata,
  Y,
  Y_error,
  X,
  X_error,
  hl.prior,
  vy.prior,
  optima.prior,
  beta.prior
)

    Arguments

    trdata

    An object of the class treedata from function treeplyr

    Y

    Vector containing name of column in treedata containing response variable

    Y_error

    Vector containing name of column in treedata containing error of response variable

    X

    Vector containing name(s) of column in treedata containing predictor variable(s)

    X_error

    Vector containing name(s) of column in treedata containing error of predictor variable(s)

    Z_adaptive

    Number of adaptive traits

    Value

    dat - list file containing objecs setup for Blouch

    Contents

    Developed by Mark Grabowski.
